column4: ok, I have a first draft of a howto for using qemu - any suggestions what I do with it?
we want to do i* for hoary
thing is, I've used i* in the past, and I was surprised how much smoother uim seems to be
mmm, seems it's the growing standard though - so best to support and improve it...
perhaps we can provide both if it's easy to handle
including japanese input support and fonts
versus a tightly honed, minimal firewall derivative
bouncing a sacred animal is a bit over the top, though.
how would apt know what MIME to register a packaged mplayer handles, for instance?
if mplayer had a .desktop file, it would work too
